source:
TEXT_LUCKZG006_03491_SEQ_00 Quest Sync
Bhol Bol is grinding his teeth, a clear sign of his foul mood.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG006_03491_SEQ_00特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト
ガリク村のボールボルは、冒険者に元家畜を退治してほしいようだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZG006_03491_TODO_00<tab>Pour the viscous oil on the feral lizard, then slay it.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG006_03491_TODO_00ガリク村西でを
を使い討伐

source: TEXT_LUCKZG006_03491_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the feral lizard meat to Bhol Bol.
TEXT_LUCKZG006_03491_BHOLBOL_000_000<tab>I have seen you around, traveler. You like making yourself useful, yes? There is work for you, if you are willing.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG006_03491_BHOLBOL_000_000強そうな旅人さんに、頼みがあるネ。
昔、逃してしまった家畜の、
「」退治してほしいネ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZG006_03491_BHOLBOL_000_001<tab>One of the lizards that I raised for meat escaped some time past. I thought it would have been eaten by predators by now, but a miner from Twine said that it attacked her. It seems to have grown into quite the brute.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG006_03491_BHOLBOL_000_001魔物に食われたと思ってたけど、しっかり成長して、
トゥワインの鉱山労働者を怪我させるほどになったヨ。
もう僕の手には負えないネ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKZG006_03491_BHOLBOL_000_002<tab>Which brings me to the job in question. I want you to put a stop to its mischief. Kill it, in other words. I would recommend softening its hide first with a splash of this oil.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG006_03491_BHOLBOL_000_002この「」かければ、
鱗が柔らかくなって、楽に退治できるはずヨ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZG006_03491_BHOLBOL_000_003<tab>Once you have taken care of it, bring me its meat. No point letting it go to waste.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG006_03491_BHOLBOL_000_003退治したら、その証として、
「」をとってきてネ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZG006_03491_BHOLBOL_000_004<tab>I heard it was prowling around the outskirts of the village, to the west. And I will know from the smell if you attempt to fob me off with meat from another lizard, so do not even try!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG006_03491_BHOLBOL_000_004「」、
村の西で見かけた話、行商人からよく聞くヨ！
退治よろしくお願いネ、旅人さん！

source: TEXT_LUCKZG006_03491_BHOLBOL_000_010<tab>Most of the lizards look the same, so we tell them apart by their scent. This one smells like burned leather, which matches what the miner from Twine told us.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG006_03491_BHOLBOL_000_010「」倒してほしいネ。
「」かければ、
鱗が柔らかくなって、楽に倒せるはずヨ！

TEXT_LUCKZG006_03491_BHOLBOL_000_020「」は倒せたネ？
それなら「」を渡してネ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZG006_03491_BHOLBOL_000_021<tab>Very good. That beast put us through a lot of trouble, so it is about time we had something to show for it.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG006_03491_BHOLBOL_000_021……おお、倒してくれたネ。
ありがとネ、旅人さん。

source: TEXT_LUCKZG006_03491_BHOLBOL_000_022<tab>They are usually quite harmless when they are young, but this one was a vicious little bastard, even then.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG006_03491_BHOLBOL_000_022あのも、小さい頃はかわいかったネ。
でも、いつの頃から、暴れん坊になったヨ。
それがヒトを襲うまでになるなんてネ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKZG006_03491_BHOLBOL_000_023<tab>Heh! This serves him right for mauling passersby. If he had any sense, he would have disappeared for good.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG006_03491_BHOLBOL_000_023静かに生きていてくれればよかったけど、
こうなっては退治するしかなかったネ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZG006_03491_BHOLBOL_000_024<tab>Anyway, I will dry this meat and send it to Twine by way of apology. For you, this should be an ample reward.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG006_03491_BHOLBOL_000_024旅人さんが取ってきてくれた肉は、燻製にして、
怪我した労働者さんに差し入れするネ。
倒してくれて、本当にありがとネ。
